gobblin.kafka.client

Interface KafkaConsumerRecord

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ByteArrayBasedKafkaRecord, DecodeableKafkaRecord<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseKafkaConsumerRecord

    public interface KafkaConsumerRecord
    A kafka message/record consumed from GobblinKafkaConsumerClient. This interface provides APIs to read message metadata. Extension interfaces like DecodeableKafkaRecord or ByteArrayBasedKafkaRecord provide APIs to read the actual message/record.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getNextOffset()
      Next offset after this record
      long getOffset()
      Offset of this record
      long getValueSizeInBytes()
      Size of the message in bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • getOffset

        long getOffset()
        Offset of this record

      • getNextOffset

        long getNextOffset()
        Next offset after this record

      • getValueSizeInBytes

        long getValueSizeInBytes()
        Size of the message in bytes. if kafka-client version does not provide size (like Kafka 09 clients)
